STRAIT OF SICILY.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM VESSEL, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD,
VICINITY 37-00N 012-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT OR PALERMO RADIO.
